Text: RE PBKBB New Contract Cc Eric My only thoughts would be to expand upon the scope of work requirements document Perhaps we can setup a discussion with Duane to fully quantify what they are doing for us Ross Original Message From Booth Eric Sent Tuesday December AM To Nemec Gerald Zisman Stuart Virgo Robert Newlin Ross Coffey James Gruesen Karen Cc Redmond Brian Subject PBKBB New Contract As promised is the new contract that Duane Harris of PBKBB promised in our meeting last week Please make any comments you have and return them to me or Duane directly Thanks Eric Original Message From Harris Duane mailto Sent Monday December PM To Booth Eric Cc Blair Roger Subject New Contract Eric Attached is the PBKBB contract for your review Also included are the applicable rate sheet insurance information and scope of work Please let me know if there are any questions and where our payment status is on the older invoices as you find out Thanks Duane Insurance Attachment Eng Cons Agtdoc Enron Americas Engineering Consulting Agtdoc SCHEDULE OF BILLING RATES Enrondoc PB SOWdoc Duane Harris Parsons Brinckerhoff Phone Fax

ReJIm Kirkpatrick can run down the documents He is at the same number Ross Benjamin CT AM To Ross ES cc Subject Ross Don and I are looking for information on the Maintimizer software systems I have given Jim Meyers a call at New Albany but he is out till Wednesday Do you know of anyone else we can talk to Thanks Ben
Org ChartsPer your request Ross Forwarded by Ross NewlinENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Cecilia NRON PM To Ross NewlinENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Org Charts Per your request

Re Allegheny Meeting this week Cc A couple of Allegheny gas folks will be in Houston this Wednesday to meet with Chris Meyer and Mitch Robinson We are still trying to get the key members from Enron up to Greensburg but no definitive plans have been reached I will keep you in the loop as things progress Thanks Ross Jennifer NRON AM To Benjamin CT Ross ES cc Subject Allegheny Meeting this week Ben and Ross I briefly spoke with Don Miller this morning and he mentioned that the Transition Team meeting with Allegheny may take place this Thursday Please let me know if theres anything you need me to do to help coordinate this effort Thanks Jennifer x Benjamin CT PM To Don CT Mitch nron Ross ES Stuart CT Chris CT Jim CT Bernie nron Merle ChurchillENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Chris NorrisENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Pete McCormickENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Gus nron Bill CT Jennifer nron Eric NRON Lloyd CT cc Subject Everyone Attached is the list of the preliminary AlleghenyEnron transition team members for the Peaker assets If you think you should not be on it or that someone else is better suited for the task then please let me know Please check over the information to make sure everything is correct We are trying to plan for a kickoff meeting with Allegheny within the next couple of weeks Thanks for your assistance with this very important project Regards Ben Rogers
Re Cc Attached are revisions and additions to Mitchs file Ross Benjamin CT PM To Ross ES cc Subject More questions Most of them are already answered Thanks Ben

Brownsville Purchasing Turnover Spreadsheet Forwarded by Ross NewlinHOUEES on PM From Jim CT on PM To Ross ES Mitchell NRON cc Subject Brownsville Purchasing Turnover Spreadsheet Ross Mitch Per your request attached is a listing of pos in regards to our earlier conversation I will update it periodically to keep you informed of any changes I will strive for a seamless transition if need be Sincerely Jim Meyer psdo you both want me to fax Ben Rogers a detailed physical inventory as of I have already printed it out for such an occasion
